item.title: JavaScript Prototypes (Video)
item.author: mark+blog@markbates.com (Mark Bates)
item.description:
In this short video we’ll take a look at the basics of how JavaScript prototypes work. We’ll also look at a few of the fun things you can do with JavaScript prototypes, as well as how they can be dangerous if mis-used.

UPDATE:

This video is now available on MetaCasts.tv. A new screen cast subscription site that focuses on Ruby and related technologies, such as Rails, JavaScript, CoffeeScript and more.
